resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73566</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>1b8cf6f9-22fa-4dd9-ad1b-0346e1663361#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Füstölő gyárkémények</string>
            <string language="en">Smoking factory chimneys</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rauchende Fabrikkamine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cheminées de tabagisme d'usine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chaminés fumando da fábrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Camini fumanti della fabbrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καπνίζοντας καπνοδόχοι εργοστασίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Chimeneas de la fábrica que fuman</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A korszerűtlen gyárkéményekből sok szennyező anyag jut a levegőbe</string>
            <string language="en">A lot of contamination get in the air from out-of-date factory chimneys</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">környezetvédelem,  levegőszennyezés,  környezetszennyezés,  szmog,  </string>
            <string language="en">environmental protection, air pollution, environmental pollution, smog</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Menge Verschmutzung erhalten in der Luft von 
den veralteten Fabrikkaminen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Beaucoup de contamination obtiennent dans le ciel
des cheminées démodées d'usine</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os muitos da contaminação começam no ar das 
chaminés out-of-date da fábrica</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La contaminazione molto ottiene nell'aria 
dai camini antiquati della fabbrica</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολλή μόλυνση παίρνει στον αέρα από τις ξεπερασμένες
καπνοδόχους εργοστασίων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los muchos de contaminación consiguen en el aire 
de las chimeneas anticuadas de la fábrica</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umweltschutz, Luftverschmutzung, Klimaverunreinigung, 
Smog</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">protection de l'environnement, pollution 
atmosphérique, pollution environnementale, brouillard enfumé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">proteção ambiental, poluição de ar, poluição 
ambiental, smog</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">protezione dell'ambiente, inquinamento atmosferico, 
inquinamento ambientale, smog</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προστασία του περιβάλλοντος, ατμοσφαιρική ρύπανση, 
περιβαλλοντική ρύπανση, αιθαλομίχλη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">protección del medio ambiente, contaminación 
atmosférica, contaminación ambiental, niebla con humo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>

          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0

fn:

end:vcard</entity>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
